tasks.title: Setup Authentication System
tasks.description: Implement authentication using AWS Cognito for email/password login with role-based access.
tasks.details: Use AWS Cognito to set up user pools and configure email/password login. Implement role-based access control for educator, admin, and read_only roles. Store secure sessions as HTTP-only cookies.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify user registration, login, and role-based access control. Ensure sessions persist across browser refreshes.

subtasks.title: Configure AWS Cognito User Pools
subtasks.description: Set up AWS Cognito user pools for email/password authentication.
subtasks.details: Create user pools in AWS Cognito and configure them for email/password login. Ensure the user pool settings align with security best practices.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify user registration and login functionality.

subtasks.title: Implement Role-Based Access Control
subtasks.description: Develop role-based access control for different user roles.
subtasks.details: Define roles for educator, admin, and read_only. Implement access control logic to restrict actions based on user roles.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test access restrictions for each role to ensure correct permissions.

subtasks.title: Set Up Secure Session Management
subtasks.description: Implement secure session management using HTTP-only cookies.
subtasks.details: Configure sessions to be stored as HTTP-only cookies. Ensure session security and persistence across browser refreshes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test session persistence and security across different browsers.

tasks.title: Implement Transcript Ingestion Endpoint
tasks.description: Create an API endpoint to ingest classroom transcripts in various formats.
tasks.details: Develop a FastAPI endpoint at /v1/ingest/transcripts to accept JSONL, CSV, and TXT files. Validate metadata including class_id, student_roster, date, and source. Store files in S3 and metadata in DynamoDB.
tasks.testStrategy: Test file uploads for all supported formats. Validate metadata storage in DynamoDB and file storage in S3.

subtasks.title: Develop FastAPI Endpoint for Transcript Ingestion
subtasks.description: Create the FastAPI endpoint at /v1/ingest/transcripts to handle transcript ingestion.
subtasks.details: Set up a FastAPI route to accept POST requests at /v1/ingest/transcripts. Ensure the endpoint can handle file uploads.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test endpoint accessibility and response to POST requests.

subtasks.title: Implement File Format Validation
subtasks.description: Validate the uploaded files to ensure they are in JSONL, CSV, or TXT format.
subtasks.details: Use Python libraries to check file headers and content for format compliance. Return errors for unsupported formats.
subtasks.testStrategy: Upload test files in various formats and verify validation responses.

subtasks.title: Integrate with S3 and DynamoDB
subtasks.description: Store files in S3 and metadata in DynamoDB after validation.
subtasks.details: Use boto3 to upload files to S3 and store metadata such as class_id, student_roster, date, and source in DynamoDB.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify file storage in S3 and metadata entry in DynamoDB for successful uploads.

tasks.title: Implement Artifact Ingestion Endpoint
tasks.description: Create an API endpoint to ingest student artifacts such as PDFs and images.
tasks.details: Develop a FastAPI endpoint at /v1/ingest/artifacts to accept PDF, DOCX, PNG, and JPG files. Use S3 presigned URLs for uploads. Validate file size and metadata.
tasks.testStrategy: Test artifact uploads using presigned URLs. Verify file size limits and metadata validation.

subtasks.title: Develop FastAPI Endpoint for Artifact Ingestion
subtasks.description: Create the FastAPI endpoint at /v1/ingest/artifacts to handle file uploads.
subtasks.details: Implement the FastAPI endpoint to accept PDF, DOCX, PNG, and JPG files. Ensure the endpoint is properly configured to handle multipart form data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test endpoint with various file types to ensure correct handling.

subtasks.title: Implement S3 Presigned URL Generation
subtasks.description: Set up the generation of S3 presigned URLs for secure file uploads.
subtasks.details: Integrate AWS SDK to generate presigned URLs for S3 bucket uploads. Ensure URLs are time-limited and secure.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify presigned URLs allow uploads and expire correctly.

subtasks.title: Validate File Size and Metadata
subtasks.description: Implement validation for file size and metadata before processing uploads.
subtasks.details: Add checks to ensure files do not exceed size limits and metadata is complete and correct. Use FastAPI validation features.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with files of varying sizes and metadata to ensure validation works as expected.

tasks.title: Develop NLP Scoring Pipeline
tasks.description: Build an NLP pipeline to score non-academic skills from transcripts and artifacts.
tasks.details: Use Hugging Face, spaCy, and NLTK to implement stages: language detection, cleanup, sentence segmentation, diarization mapping, skill cue detection, scoring, and explanation extraction. Ensure reproducibility with deterministic seeds.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate pipeline outputs against sample data. Ensure skill scores and evidence are accurate and reproducible.

subtasks.title: Implement Language Detection
subtasks.description: Develop the language detection stage using NLP tools.
subtasks.details: Use spaCy and Hugging Face models to detect the language of transcripts. Ensure accuracy and handle multiple languages.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test with multilingual transcripts to verify detection accuracy.

subtasks.title: Develop Text Cleanup Module
subtasks.description: Create a module to clean up transcripts for processing.
subtasks.details: Implement text normalization, remove noise, and standardize formats using NLTK and spaCy.
subtasks.testStrategy: Validate cleanup by comparing pre- and post-cleanup text samples.

subtasks.title: Create Sentence Segmentation Process
subtasks.description: Segment transcripts into sentences for further analysis.
subtasks.details: Use spaCy to accurately segment text into sentences, considering punctuation and language nuances.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test segmentation on varied text samples to ensure sentence boundaries are correctly identified.

subtasks.title: Implement Diarization Mapping
subtasks.description: Map speaker diarization to transcript segments.
subtasks.details: Integrate diarization tools to associate speakers with text segments, ensuring accurate speaker identification.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify diarization accuracy by comparing mapped speakers with known speaker data.

subtasks.title: Develop Skill Cue Detection
subtasks.description: Detect skill cues within segmented sentences.
subtasks.details: Use Hugging Face models to identify and extract skill-related cues from text segments.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test detection accuracy using annotated datasets with known skill cues.

tasks.title: Create Evidence Extraction Module
tasks.description: Extract and rank evidence spans for each skill score.
tasks.details: Develop a module to extract text spans from transcripts and artifacts. Rank spans based on relevance and provide rationales. Cite transcript line numbers or artifact pages.
tasks.testStrategy: Check evidence spans for accuracy and relevance. Ensure spans map to correct lines/pages.

subtasks.title: Develop Text Span Extraction Algorithm
subtasks.description: Create an algorithm to extract text spans from transcripts and artifacts.
subtasks.details: Design and implement an algorithm to identify and extract relevant text spans from provided transcripts and artifacts. Ensure the algorithm can handle various formats and languages.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test extraction accuracy against a set of predefined examples.

subtasks.title: Implement Relevance Ranking System
subtasks.description: Develop a system to rank extracted text spans based on relevance.
subtasks.details: Create a ranking mechanism that evaluates the relevance of each extracted text span. Use criteria such as keyword matching and context analysis to determine relevance.
subtasks.testStrategy: Evaluate ranking accuracy using a benchmark dataset.

subtasks.title: Integrate Line/Page Citation Feature
subtasks.description: Add functionality to cite transcript line numbers or artifact pages for each span.
subtasks.details: Implement a feature that associates each extracted text span with its corresponding line number in the transcript or page number in the artifact.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify correct citation of lines/pages for a sample set of spans.

tasks.title: Design Streamlit Dashboard
tasks.description: Develop a Streamlit dashboard for educators to view assessments and trends.
tasks.details: Create views for Class Overview, Student Detail, Trends, Uploads and Jobs, and Data Quality Flags. Ensure WCAG AA compliance and export functionality for CSV/PDF summaries.
tasks.testStrategy: Test dashboard navigation and data visualization. Verify accessibility compliance and export functionality.

subtasks.title: Develop Class Overview View
subtasks.description: Create the Class Overview view for the Streamlit dashboard.
subtasks.details: Design and implement the Class Overview view, displaying class-level assessment summaries and key metrics.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify data accuracy and UI responsiveness.

subtasks.title: Implement Student Detail View
subtasks.description: Develop the Student Detail view to show individual student assessments.
subtasks.details: Create a detailed view for individual students, including assessment scores and progress tracking.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test data retrieval and visualization for individual students.

subtasks.title: Ensure WCAG AA Compliance
subtasks.description: Ensure the dashboard meets WCAG AA accessibility standards.
subtasks.details: Review and update the dashboard to comply with WCAG AA guidelines, focusing on color contrast and keyboard navigation.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct accessibility testing using tools like Axe and manual checks.

subtasks.title: Implement Export Functionality
subtasks.description: Add export functionality for CSV/PDF summaries.
subtasks.details: Develop features to export dashboard data as CSV and PDF, ensuring data integrity and format consistency.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test export functionality for accuracy and format correctness.

tasks.title: Implement State Persistence and History
tasks.description: Set up PostgreSQL and DynamoDB for data persistence and history tracking.
tasks.details: Design PostgreSQL schema for assessments, evidence, and aggregates. Use DynamoDB for job metadata. Implement S3 versioning for raw inputs and anonymized copies.
tasks.testStrategy: Verify data persistence and retrieval from PostgreSQL and DynamoDB. Test S3 versioning and data integrity.

subtasks.title: Design PostgreSQL Schema for Assessments
subtasks.description: Create a detailed schema for storing assessment data in PostgreSQL.
subtasks.details: Define tables for assessments, including fields for assessment ID, type, date, and results. Ensure normalization and indexing for efficient queries.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify schema creation and data insertion.

subtasks.title: Design PostgreSQL Schema for Evidence and Aggregates
subtasks.description: Develop schema for evidence and aggregate data in PostgreSQL.
subtasks.details: Create tables for evidence with fields for evidence ID, type, and associated assessment ID. Design aggregate tables for summary data.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test data integrity and retrieval efficiency.

subtasks.title: Integrate DynamoDB for Job Metadata
subtasks.description: Set up DynamoDB tables for storing job metadata.
subtasks.details: Define a table for job metadata with fields for job ID, status, and timestamps. Implement indexing for quick access.
subtasks.testStrategy: Ensure data can be stored and retrieved accurately.

subtasks.title: Implement S3 Versioning for Raw Inputs
subtasks.description: Set up S3 versioning for raw input files and anonymized copies.
subtasks.details: Configure S3 buckets to enable versioning. Ensure that both raw and anonymized files are versioned correctly.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test file uploads and verify versioning functionality.

tasks.title: Develop Batch Processing with AWS Lambda
tasks.description: Implement asynchronous batch processing using AWS Lambda and SQS.
tasks.details: Set up AWS Lambda functions to handle batch processing of transcripts and artifacts. Use SQS for job queuing and Step Functions for orchestration.
tasks.testStrategy: Test batch processing for scalability and reliability. Ensure jobs are processed correctly and logs are maintained.

subtasks.title: Set Up AWS Lambda Functions for Batch Processing
subtasks.description: Create and configure AWS Lambda functions to handle batch processing of transcripts and artifacts.
subtasks.details: Define Lambda function specifications, including memory, timeout, and environment variables. Implement code to process input data and produce desired output.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test Lambda functions with sample data to ensure correct processing and output.

subtasks.title: Integrate AWS SQS for Job Queuing
subtasks.description: Set up AWS SQS to queue jobs for batch processing by Lambda functions.
subtasks.details: Create SQS queues and configure them to trigger Lambda functions. Ensure proper message handling and error management.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test SQS integration by sending test messages and verifying Lambda function execution.

subtasks.title: Implement AWS Step Functions for Orchestration
subtasks.description: Use AWS Step Functions to orchestrate the batch processing workflow.
subtasks.details: Design a Step Functions state machine to manage the sequence of Lambda function executions and handle errors.
subtasks.testStrategy: Simulate workflow execution with Step Functions to verify correct orchestration and error handling.

subtasks.title: Test Batch Processing for Scalability and Reliability
subtasks.description: Conduct tests to ensure the batch processing system is scalable and reliable.
subtasks.details: Perform load testing and monitor system performance under different conditions. Ensure logs are maintained for all processes.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use AWS CloudWatch to monitor performance metrics and logs. Validate system behavior under load.

tasks.title: Create API for Assessment Retrieval
tasks.description: Develop endpoints to retrieve skill scores and evidence for students.
tasks.details: Implement FastAPI endpoints at /v1/assessments/{student_id} and /v1/assessments/{student_id}/history to return latest scores and historical data.
tasks.testStrategy: Test API responses for accuracy and completeness. Verify historical data retrieval.

tasks.title: Implement Class Dashboard API
tasks.description: Create an API endpoint for class rollup data.
tasks.details: Develop a FastAPI endpoint at /v1/classes/{class_id}/dashboard to provide class-level assessment summaries and trends.
tasks.testStrategy: Validate class dashboard data accuracy and response times. Ensure data is aggregated correctly.

tasks.title: Set Up Deployment Pipeline
tasks.description: Configure CI/CD pipeline for automated deployment using GitHub Actions.
tasks.details: Use GitHub Actions to automate Docker image builds, run tests, perform security scans, and deploy to AWS environments. Implement blue/green or rolling updates.
tasks.testStrategy: Test CI/CD pipeline for successful builds and deployments. Verify no downtime during updates.

subtasks.title: Configure GitHub Actions for CI/CD Pipeline
subtasks.description: Set up GitHub Actions workflows for building Docker images and running tests.
subtasks.details: Create YAML files in the .github/workflows directory to automate Docker image builds and run unit tests on each commit.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify successful Docker builds and test execution in GitHub Actions logs.

subtasks.title: Implement Security Scans in CI/CD Pipeline
subtasks.description: Integrate security scanning tools into the CI/CD pipeline to ensure code safety.
subtasks.details: Use tools like Snyk or Trivy to scan Docker images and code for vulnerabilities during the CI process.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check security scan reports for vulnerabilities and ensure they are addressed.

subtasks.title: Set Up Deployment Strategy with Blue/Green Updates
subtasks.description: Implement a blue/green deployment strategy using AWS for zero-downtime updates.
subtasks.details: Configure AWS environments to support blue/green deployments. Use GitHub Actions to automate the switch between environments.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test deployment process to ensure no downtime and successful environment switch.

tasks.title: Implement Health Check Endpoint
tasks.description: Create a health check endpoint for service monitoring.
tasks.details: Develop a FastAPI endpoint at /healthz to return service status. Integrate with AWS CloudWatch for monitoring.
tasks.testStrategy: Test health check endpoint for availability and correct status reporting. Monitor logs in CloudWatch.

tasks.title: Develop Job Status API
tasks.description: Create an API endpoint to check the status of processing jobs.
tasks.details: Implement FastAPI endpoint at /v1/admin/jobs/{job_id} to return job status and logs. Integrate with DynamoDB for metadata retrieval.
tasks.testStrategy: Test job status retrieval for accuracy and completeness. Verify log access and error reporting.

tasks.title: Implement Security and Audit Logging
tasks.description: Set up security measures and audit logging for compliance.
tasks.details: Configure AWS Cognito for secure authentication. Implement audit logging in CloudWatch and RDS for all access and actions. Ensure FERPA/PPRA compliance.
tasks.testStrategy: Test security configurations and audit logs for completeness and accuracy. Verify compliance with data protection standards.

subtasks.title: Configure AWS Cognito for Secure Authentication
subtasks.description: Set up AWS Cognito to manage secure user authentication.
subtasks.details: Create a user pool in AWS Cognito and configure identity providers. Set up multi-factor authentication and define user roles and permissions.
subtasks.testStrategy: Test user login and role-based access control.

subtasks.title: Implement Audit Logging in CloudWatch
subtasks.description: Set up audit logging in AWS CloudWatch for monitoring access and actions.
subtasks.details: Configure CloudWatch to capture and store logs for all API calls and user actions. Set up alerts for suspicious activities.
subtasks.testStrategy: Verify log entries for all access and actions. Test alert triggers.

subtasks.title: Set Up Audit Logging in RDS
subtasks.description: Implement audit logging in RDS to track database access and modifications.
subtasks.details: Enable RDS logging for all database transactions. Configure log retention and access policies.
subtasks.testStrategy: Check RDS logs for completeness and accuracy of recorded transactions.

subtasks.title: Verify FERPA/PPRA Compliance
subtasks.description: Ensure all security and logging measures comply with FERPA/PPRA standards.
subtasks.details: Review security configurations and audit logs to ensure compliance with FERPA/PPRA. Document compliance measures and conduct a compliance audit.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct a compliance audit and verify all measures meet FERPA/PPRA requirements.

tasks.title: Conduct MVP Testing and Validation
tasks.description: Perform comprehensive testing of all MVP features and user stories.
tasks.details: Execute the MVP testing checklist to validate core functionality, educator flows, resilience, and security. Address any identified issues.
tasks.testStrategy: Conduct user acceptance testing with educators. Validate all success metrics and ensure no P1 security issues.

subtasks.title: Test Core Functionality
subtasks.description: Validate all core features of the MVP for correct functionality.
subtasks.details: Use the MVP testing checklist to verify each core feature operates as expected. Document any discrepancies.
subtasks.testStrategy: Perform unit and integration tests for each feature.

subtasks.title: Validate Educator User Flows
subtasks.description: Ensure all educator user flows are intuitive and error-free.
subtasks.details: Simulate educator interactions and verify each step in the user flow. Identify and document any usability issues.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct user acceptance testing with educators.

subtasks.title: Assess System Resilience
subtasks.description: Test the system's ability to handle stress and recover from failures.
subtasks.details: Perform load testing and simulate failure scenarios to ensure the system remains stable and recovers gracefully.
subtasks.testStrategy: Use automated stress testing tools to simulate high load and failure conditions.

subtasks.title: Conduct Security Testing
subtasks.description: Identify and address any security vulnerabilities in the MVP.
subtasks.details: Perform security audits and penetration testing to uncover vulnerabilities. Prioritize fixing P1 security issues.
subtasks.testStrategy: Conduct penetration testing and vulnerability scanning.

subtasks.title: Review and Address Identified Issues
subtasks.description: Compile and resolve all issues identified during testing phases.
subtasks.details: Review documented issues from all testing phases and implement necessary fixes. Re-test to ensure issues are resolved.
subtasks.testStrategy: Re-test resolved issues to confirm fixes are effective.
